question: Which state government has recently passed Prevention of Slaughter and Preservation of cattle Bill 2020?
explanation: The Karnataka government has recently passed Prevention of Slaughter and Preservation of cattle Bill 2020. The Bill clearly seeks a ban on all the forms of cattle slaughter and stricter punishment for wrongdoers. Police officers ranked Sub-Inspector will have the authority to explore premises and capture the cattle or anything which is used intentionally to commit the offence.
